meanings.definition: Zelkovas: a type of deciduous tree commonly found in Asia and North America.
meanings.sent1: The zelkovas in the park provide shade on hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant colors of zelkovas during the fall season.
meanings.sent3: The zelkovas had a secret meeting to discuss their leafy matters.
meanings.sent4: The zelkovas stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The zelkovas swayed gracefully in the breeze, a true symbol of nature's beauty.
